channel.title: Removing animated flames on 317 clients!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm editing a 317 client to fit FroyoScape. I'm trying to remove the animated flames [url=http://prntscr.com/n74h6]http://prntscr.com/n74h6[/url]. I've read through 5 tutorials and did everything they said and it ends up making the client not run. So does anyone know?
[b]NOTE[/b] The background is just temporary. Was one I found real quick on desktop and added it.

item.title: Removing animated flames on 317 clients!
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I believe it’s method58(
On some clients, not all. non renamed Winterlove based servers usually have method58(

Read full topic

item.title: Removing animated flames on 317 clients!
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

calcFlamesPosition();
calcFlamesPosition();

Find that in Client.Java

and comment them out.

// calcFlamesPosition();
// calcFlamesPosition();

Read full topic
